title: Title
imageUploadText: Drag your image here or click to upload an image from disk. The minimum image resolution should be 1440x900. You can download a free image from https://pixnio.com.
impageUploadTextMobile: Tap here to upload an image. The minimum image resolution should be 1440x900.
confirmationText: Are you sure that you want to delete this newsfeed post? The post will be moved to the Recycle Bin and you will be able to restore it from there.
imageSizeValidation: The minimum image resolution should be 1440x900!
restoreNewsfeed: Are you sure that you want to restore this newsfeed?
confirmationTextFinalDelete: Are you sure that you want to delete this newsfeed from the Recycle Bin? This is a final operation that CAN NOT be reverted.
